author: zkdid
content: Well I just switched off the net, but truthfully was wondering if I should have used a PC and used DOS before booting Widows to get below the OS layer, I use Mac by the way, so I just switched off the net and run the CLI, but wondered what went in to the logs, was the CLI encrypted? and how would I know if there is a key logger as the CLI specifically asks you to type the Key back in to confirm you wrote it down properly. I am asking as I am studying some security theories. Thanks for your time.
